title: Hosszú ékezetes betűk hiánya
content:
Üdv,

Egy pár hete vettem észre, hogy egyes weboldalakon nem jelennek meg az ő és ű (azaz a hosszú ö és ü) betűk. Az ilyen oldalakon (pl. Facebook), a Chrome-ban látszik, hogy a használt betűtípusban nem voltak ilyen karakterek, ezért a Chrome behelyettesít egy alap (pl. Arial) ékezetes betűt. Ez elüt a többitől, de legalább megjelenik. A Firefoxban látszólag nem működik ez a behelyettesítés. Azt megnéztem, hogy a hibásan megjelenő oldalak ugyanúgy HTML5-ösek és UTF-8 kódolásúak, lang=hu beállítással, mint azok, amelyeken megjelennek a karakterek.

A gépen pár napja Win 11 Pro van, de már a frissítés előtt is megvolt a hiba.

Én állíthattam el valamit, vagy ez egy bug? Esetleg tudatos Firefox limitáció?
creator: hellsing5960

title: Remove Search function in Address Bar
content: Hello. After reading numerous posts addressing similar issues & having no success, I've decided to post a question of my own. I am running the current version of firefox, 94.0.2. I use the Search Bar religiously for searches to sites like google, wikipedia, youtube, amazon, and ebay. I NEVER use the address bar for searches. I have attempted to disable all functionality associated with searching via the address bar. When I go to the address bar, it is because I have a specifc url I know I want to type with a specific destination in mind. Occasionally, I have a need to just go to the home page of one of my search sites, most often it's amazon.com. Recently (not sure which version of firefox) I've found when I go to the Address Bar & type amazon.com, I cannot just go to amazon.com, instead the address bar turns into a search bar. How do I disable this? Its driving me mad! I swear I've disabled every option I can within about:config related to urlb. Please Help. I don't want to switch to Chrome, but I'm tired of my settings getting messed up every time mozilla pushes a new version.
creator: andrewpatricksmith

title: facebook
content: Gentilissimi amivi Firefox, da più tempo mi succede una cosa strana. Solo su Facebook ad un certo punto l'apertura delle pagine e dei commenti o delle schede di notifica, rallenta. Esce la famosa rotellina che gira e rigira, e la pagina non si apre. Solo su FB, per il resto navigo tranquillamente. Ah... dimenticavo, qualche volta lo fa anche su Watsapp, ma di meno. Faccio la stessa prova su Crome e, invece, tutto va bene. Mi fa rabbia perché io adoro Firefox e vorrei utilizzare solo quello. Mi date qualche dritta per risolvere il problema. Via doro e andate forte! Foza Mozilla fundation. Giovanni Caputo
creator: gcaputo4

title: How can I send feed back on the newest update?
content:
I was looking for a way to reset Firefox to bring back the previous print preview. In several places the person offering an answer suggests sending feedback to Mozilla re the changes, but... no link or place to send feedback.

My desktop and laptop have only just been updated to the latest version with very bright white backgrounds, really large firefox icon on home page, less definition between tabs, a lighter weight font on menus, strange layout on the hamburger menu, and a reset to a google-like print window.

I tried on my desktop to change the bright white background using the colors option. Once I found the settings to tone down the brightness to a very pale grey for the home page and results page, every page I went to had changed fonts and lost colors.

Print preview was an awesome tool, many web pages are set up in such a way that when it is printed the fonts are huge, and the web page header prints over the text of the printout. On the worst panels of links to other stories and ads also print. Your preview allowed me to zoom in/out easily and the simplified version was brilliant.

The tabs are grey on grey with no definite edge, and they just keep shrinking showing less and less of the tab name, instead of hiding extra tabs of the edges. I have 10-20 tabs open on a regular basis often in 2 separate windows and would much rather have a tab label that IDs the page than having to click on each page.

Font - the menu font is now a small fine sans serif that is difficult to read.

Hamburger menu - Why is new tab, find in page, save page as, and print here? In particular why are they at the top of the menu? Please move the new tab panel and print panel to the bottom, the Bookmarks panel to the top and put the Settings panel immediately below it. It would also help if you added a cog icon to the settings panel.

Please add a feedback link without sign-on to your page.
creator: olearymr

title: Firefox won't sync when SmartProxy (or FoxyProxy) is enabled
content:

I even tried setting up a new profile with a different, new, Firefox Sync account and the outcome is the same. Anyone else having this trouble? Is this a bug? Should I report it? Anyone wants to help me reproduce it? Thanks in advance!

PS: This happens on my Windows 10 machine too.

title: "Never remember history" changes to "Use custom..." and "...private mode"
content:
Version 94.0.2 (64-bit) Windows 10

Hi.

A few times in Settings I selected History->Never remember history, yet upon reopening the browser the setting was changed to "Use custom settings for history" and "Always use private mode." Why is this happening?

The larger issue is Cached Web Content (CWC), which doesn't completely delete like everything else. No matter the settings to delete everything upon closing or never remember, every time I reopen FF and click Clear Data there is some data in CWC (albeit in kb). I've read many pages and posts here and it's still not clear: A) Why isn't it 0 bytes and B) If a previously visited site can access the CWC, then isn't that a strike against privacy?

Sincerley,

Hank
creator: hank.leeps

title: TTFB vs cache
content:
Hi,

I wonder why Firefox is so slow when a site is present in it's cache.

It's been the same problem for years, whenever I'm getting a long TTFB from the server, let's say a TTFB of a second or two, I know that clearing Firefox's cache of that site will resolve the issue and bring down the TTFB to it's normal of around 100ms.

Why and how clearing the cache changes the server TTFB?

Thank you.

-- Francois

title: Autofirma pide contraseña maestra y dice que no hay certificados digitales
content:
Hola buenas tardes, he entrado en estas dos web:

https://www.juntadeandalucia.es/economiayhacienda/apl/surweb/ayuda/requisitosTecnicos.jsp

https://sede.dgt.gob.es/es/otros-tramites/verificacion-certificados/padi/padi.shtml

Para ver si mi equipo está bien configurado para realizar firmas en documentos oficiales.

Los problemas son los siguientes:

1º.- Después de introducir la clave maestra me arroja un error SAF-19 diciendo que no hay certificados digitales válidos o están caducados.

En opciones -> certificados están los certificados y todos están vigentes.

2º.- Elimino la clave maestra y repito el proceso y ¡¡¡me pide la contraseña maestra!!! sin la he eliminado. No entiendo.

3º.- Después de eliminar la contraseña maestra, elimino los certificados, reinicio, instalo los certificados y establezco la contraseña maestra y vuelve a aparecer el error SAF-19, que no hay certificados.

Por supuesto que al iniciar el proceso de verificación me abre el autofirma y después es cuando pide la contraseña maestra.

¿Alguna forma de solucionar este problema?

La versión de firefox que uso es la 87. Me funcionaba perfectamente pero he tenido que retroceder a un punto anterior ya que las actualizaciones del windows 10 me ha hecho destrozo en mi pc y he tenido que volver a un punto anterior, reinstalando una clonación de la unidad.

Gracias a quién me ayude y saludos

title: Firefox no abre la aplicación nativa WhatsApp
content:
Hola! Soy usuario de Firefox desde hace más de 15 años, lo uso como navegador predeterminado desde entonces, en todos mis dispositivos: PC Windows, Android, Linux y MacOS.

El presente problema me sucede en Windows 10 x64. Cada vez que deseo enviar un mensaje de WhatsApp mediante la url: https://wa.me/549xxxxxxxx me abre una pagina de WhatsApp que es difícil de leer, hasta poder llegar a la indicación "continuar con chat". Una vez que se hace click en dicho link me abre el WhatsApp Web.

Ahora, en Chrome, no aparece dicha web, directamente abre el WhatsApp Web, si no esta instalado en Windows la aplicación nativa o directamente abre la aplicación nativa, si esta instalada. Lo cual sería mucho más cómodo.

¿Hay que habilitar algo en la configuración para obtener el mismo comportamiento con dicha web?

Gracias.

Guido.

title: Firefox caching shopping cart incorrectly
content:
Hi,

I am having an issue with a website I am developing, which I am only seeing in Firefox. To reproduce please try the following:

1. Go to https://mymummyteacher.com/store and add a product to the cart. 2. Close the tab / browser 3. Go back to https://mymummyteacher.com/store and add a product to the cart. The single product that has been just added is shown, however the Subtotal and Total are showing as if the previously added product is still in there too.

If I do a hard reload (hold down shift), all the other products then appear. So I think this is an issue with caching. I am not seeing it on other browsers. Is this a bug, or is there something I can do to stop it happening?

Thanks
